column2: Quotient Ltd. is a commercial-stage diagnostics company. The firm focuses on blood grouping and donor disease screening, which is referred to as transfusion diagnostics. The company is engaged in developing, manufacturing and commercializing conventional reagent products used for blood grouping within the global transfusion diagnostics market. The company is engaged in developing MosaiQ, which is its technology platform. The firm develops, manufactures and commercializes the products, including antisera products, reagent red blood cells, whole blood controls and ancillary products. Its antisera products contain antibodies used to identify blood group antigens. Its antisera products are monoclonal antibodies manufactured from master cell lines it owns. Its reagent red blood cells products are composed of human red blood cells formulated to enable the identification of blood group antibodies. The firm develops, manufactures and sells conventional reagent products to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs).
